note: Header: Cover of book BLUE:SEASON, with art by Julia L. Kay and photo by Kyle Cassidy. Profile pic: midaged lady with cat. Journalist, novelist, aspiring anti-racist. #Disabled 40+ years from MS. Bronx-born Philadelphian. .Author of BLUE: SEASON (Mumblers Press) and I AIN'T MARCHING ANYMORE (The New Press). On Twitter at @CrisAintMarchin, for now. DSA Democrat, help edit DSA mag Democratic Left Online.Also @counter.social, and Chrisblue@journa.host. #Lesbian, married to .@LinuxAndYarn
